title: ISic030273. I.Sicily inscription 030273
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---]Α[---]
2[---]ΜΗΦΗ[---]
3[---..]ΙΑΚΟΝ[..---]
4[---].ΑΛΑ.[..---]

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Manganaro, Orsi and Arangio-Ruiz ;
  • 1: Line not read by Orsi or Arangio-Ruiz, but the photograph seems to support Manganaro
  • 2: Orsi, Arangio-Ruiz: [- -]. ΦΗ . .[- -] (the first character is Α or Λ)
  • 4: Manganaro: [- - τ]αλ[αντ-]

translation

commentary

Notwithstanding the statements of SEG and Manganaro himself, there are subtle differences between the text read by Manganaro, and that of Orsi / Arangio-Ruiz.

bibliography

  • 49.1313.D https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Orsi 1900 53 no. 24 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001707
  • Arangio-Ruiz and Olivieri 1925 129 no. 14.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001378
  • Manganaro 1999 62 no. 50 fig. 131 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001813
  • 180 n. 7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000160
